headline: FDA Accepts Viatris Supplemental New Drug Application for MR-141 (Phentolamine Ophthalmic Solution 0.75%) for the Treatment of Presbyopia
summary: Viatris Inc. (Nasdaq: VTRS), a global healthcare company, today announced that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has accepted for review the supplemental New Drug Application (sNDA) for MR-141 (phentolamine ophthalmic solution 0.75%) for the treatment of presbyopia. The FDA has assigned a PDUFA goal date of October 17, 2026. Presbyopia is the age-related progressive loss of the ability to focus on close objects that results in blurred near vision and eye strain. headline: Earnings To Watch: Viatris (VTRS) Reports Q4 Results Tomorrow
summary: Medication company Viatris (NASDAQ:VTRS) will be announcing earnings results this Thursday before market hours. Here’s what to expect.
